casename: United Overseas Bank Limited v Victor F A Fernandez
counsel: Victor Fernandez (in person); Low Yew Shen (Ng Chong & Hue LLC) for the creditors
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Petition/Appeal/Whether bankruptcy order should be set aside/Whether bank had fully complied with provisions in raising presumption that debtor was unable to pay debts-Bankruptcy Act (Cap 20) ss 62(a) and 65(3).
